I would call this game a great game followed by a toxic community. Overall the gameplay is great other than the hit boxes which aren't horrible, but I'll say definetly needs improvement. One of the only problems with this game is the toxic community which, is probably the reason not everyone who enjoys fps's plays this game. The graphics are great for a game this old. Although the game is not greatly updated I would put it as a 8/10
